  • Method Details

    • subscribe

      public <E extends LibEvent> void subscribe(Class<E> eventClass, Consumer<E> handler)
      Description copied from interface: EventBus
      Subscribes a handler to a custom LibEvent. When an event of the specified class is called, the provided handler will be executed.
      Specified by:
      subscribe in interface EventBus
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the LibEvent.
      Parameters:
      eventClass - The class of the custom event to listen for.
      handler - The Consumer that will handle the event.

    • call

      public void call(LibEvent event)
      Description copied from interface: EventBus
      Calls a custom LibEvent, triggering all subscribed handlers for that event type.
      Specified by:
      call in interface EventBus
      Parameters:
      event - The LibEvent object to call.

    • subscribePlatform

      public <T> void subscribePlatform(Class<T> platformEventClass, Consumer<T> handler)
      Description copied from interface: EventBus
      Subscribes a handler to a native platform event (e.g., a Bukkit event, BungeeCord event). The underlying implementation will handle the platform-specific registration of the listener.
      Specified by:
      subscribePlatform in interface EventBus
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the platform event.
      Parameters:
      platformEventClass - The class of the platform event to listen for.
      handler - The Consumer that will handle the event.

    • register

      public void register(Object listener)
      Description copied from interface: EventBus
      Registers an object containing methods that act as event listeners. Each method intended as a listener should be manually registered or follow a convention for the specific platform's event handling mechanism.
      Specified by:
      register in interface EventBus
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener object to register.
